Error block further processing
Override Give an override

"This field defines the base amount on which bonus is to be calculated for deposits of SAVINGS PLAN type.
If defined as 'PRINCIPAL' then the bonus will be calcuated on the amount in the PRINCIPAL field in AZ.ACCOUNT.
If defined as 'INTEREST' then the bonus will be calculated on the interest that has been capitalised so far.
If '' then the bonus will be calculated on the WORKING.BALANCE of the account.
If MULTI is set to 'YES' then the base amount will be the sum of the amounts of the valid sub accounts.
Allowed values are 'PRINCIPAL', 'INTEREST' and ''.
This field should be read along with BONUS.ON.ARREARS

This field defines if bonus is to calculated even if there are any arrears in the payment installment of deposit.
If defined as '' then even of one installment is not paid then bonus will not be calculated.
If defined as 'YES' then if the number of late payments exeeds the defined LIAB.TO.PENALTY then bonus will not be calculated.
Allowed values are 'YES' and ''.

Defines when the charges defined in LATE.PYMT.FEE field in APP are to be collected when they are processed during COB.
IMMEDIATE: The fee will be collected immediately while processing in COB.
MATURITY: The fee will be carried forward till maturity of the deposit. This is applicable in the case of part withdrawal of deposit.
NEXT-INSTALLMENT: In the case of part withdrawal of Savings Plan type, the fee will be adjusted in the next installment credited to the account.
NEXT-INT-DUE: In the case of part withdrawal the fee will be adjusted in the next interest due for remaining deposit
Valid values are, IMMEDIATE, MATURITY, NEXT-INSTALLMENT, NEXT-INT-DUE
